title: Omar Ibn Seid - evaluate written source

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, C, and D. Describe the treatment enslaved people experienced aboard ships like those referenced in the source. Describe a broader historical context of ibn Seid’s autobiography that is not specifically addressed in the source.Explain how slave narratives help further understanding in the field of African American Studies. Explain how the transatlantic slave trade destabilized West African societies.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
